item.title: Sharing desktop via VNC
item.author: mhcerri at gmail dot com (Marcelo Henrique Cerri)
item.description: Install tigervnc. Generate a password. $ vncpasswd ~/.vncpasswd Password: Verify: Would you like to enter a view-only password (y/n)? n Run x0vncserver. $ x0vncserver -passwordfile ~/.vncpasswd Check if the firewall is not blocking connections to the port 5900 and try to access the current desktop using a VNC client from other machine.
